amendment.description: Amendment provides $10 million for use by the Secretary in gaining the authority to transfer unused VA facilities to the various States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for Veterans Health Administration- Medical Services by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Mica.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
